item.title: Using Tallow Balm as a Moisturiser: A Natural Alternative to Lotions
item.description: Using Tallow Balm as a Moisturiser: A Natural Alternative Tallow balm NZ is one of the best natural alternatives to commercial moisturisers. It hydrates deeply, absorbs quickly, and nourishes without synthetic chemicals. Why Use Tallow Balm Instead of Lotion? ✔ Deep Hydration – Locks in moisture for hours, unlike water-based creams. ✔ Skin-Loving Nutrients – Contains vitamins A, D, E, and K for skin health. ✔ Non-Greasy & Fast-Absorbing – Doesn’t sit on the skin like petroleum-based creams.
